description: a(n) = floor of Sum_{ d divides n } phi(d)/d.
references: D. M. Burton, Elementary Number Theory, Allyn and Bacon Inc. Boston, MA, 1976, p. 152.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,1000
maple: A062362 := proc(n) add(numtheory[phi](d)/d,d=numtheory[divisors](n)) ; floor(%) ; end: # _R. J. Mathar_, Jun 28 2009
prog: (PARI) j=[]; for(n=1,250,j=concat(j,floor(sumdiv(n,d,eulerphi(d)/d)))); j(PARI) { for (n=1, 1000, write("b062362.txt", n, " ", floor(sumdiv(n, d, eulerphi(d)/d))) ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 06 2009
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jul 07 2001
extensions: Definition clarified by _R. J. Mathar_, Jun 28 2009
